comment: Last night's PI / non-PI call is such a great microcosm for our society . Two sets of people watched the exact same thing and came away unequivocally positive of two exact opposite results .
amr:
# ::snt Last night's PI / non-PI call is such a great microcosm for our society . Two sets of people watched the exact same thing and came away unequivocally positive of two exact opposite results .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / microcosm
            :domain (c / call-02
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (r / research-institute
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "PI"))
                        :op2 (r2 / research-institute
                              :polarity -
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "PI")))
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :dayperiod (n3 / night)
                        :mod (y / yesterday)))
            :beneficiary (s / society
                  :poss (w / we))
            :mod (g / great
                  :degree (s2 / such)))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (w2 / watch-01
                  :ARG0 (s3 / set
                        :quant 2
                        :consist-of (p / person))
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (s4 / same-01
                              :mod (e / exact))))
            :op2 (c2 / come-01
                  :ARG1 s3
                  :ARG4 (p2 / positive
                        :ARG1-of (e2 / equivocate-01
                              :polarity -)
                        :topic (r3 / result
                              :quant 2
                              :ARG1-of (o / opposite-01
                                    :mod (e3 / exact))))
                  :direction (a3 / away))))

comment: Offensive players " initiate contact " all the time on pass plays . So I don't understand that as a complete dismissal of a potential DPI .
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / initiate-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (p2 / play-01
                        :ARG1-of (o / offense-02)))
            :ARG1 (c / contact-01
                  :ARG0 p)
            :time (p3 / play-01
                  :ARG1 (p4 / pass-03))
            :time (t / time
                  :mod (a / all)))
      :snt2 (u / understand-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (d / dismiss-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "DPI")
                        :mod (p5 / potential))
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / complete-02))))
